resources.string: OUVAL RESEARCHÂ® were established in 1997 by the founders, who had idealism to engendering creative and flexible products, while at the same time representing the youth lifestyle. \nThe idea was encouraged by a skateboarding community, which was not only about sport, but it was also became a certain lifestyle. That idealistic thought then was exposed into style of fashion that could be used by either local or international community. \n This Application is mobile version from Ouval Research web online and who had the same features.
